short_summary: Microwave Signal Generator for National Defence
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the purchase of One (1) Microwave Signal Generator, 100 KHz to 6 GHz.
full_summary:
# Microwave Signal Generator
## Solicitation Number: W6369-22-X059/A
## Submission Closing Date: 2024-05-21T14:00:00

**Background and Brief Overview**
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a procurement requirement for a Microwave Signal Generator, 100 KHz to 6 GHz. The bid solicitation seeks a single contract for this requirement.

**Critical Tender Information and Requirements**
* Bid submission closing date: May 21, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Tender solicitation: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Evaluation criteria: Mandatory Evaluation Criteria (listed in the RFP)
* Evaluation method: Lowest Price
* Selection criteria: The compliant Bidder offering the lowest-cost, compliant proposal

**Rationale for Tender and Positions**
The DND intends to award a single contract for this procurement requirement. If the notice differs from the RFP, the RFP takes precedence. The department reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Language and Documents Submission**
Documents may be submitted in either of the official languages of Canada. The RFP and all related documentation are available at the following links:
* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32624/w6369-22-x059_microwave_signal_generator_rfp__-a_0.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32624/qa7---w6369-22-x059-a--fr.pdf
* English and French (in a single PDF file): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/32624/w6369-22-x059__french_rfp-a_0.pdf

**Additional Info and Details**
* Response to the RFP may include:
	+ Detailed requirements (Section 4 of the RFP)
	+ Clarification on Mandatory Evaluation Criteria (ANNEX A)
	+ Return on Investment (ROI) analysis for the proposed solution

Feel free to contact the Contracting Authority:
* Name: Scarlet Torraka Almendarez
* Email: [scarlet.torrakaalmendarez@forces.gc.ca](mailto:scarlet.torrakaalmendarez@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 598-2155
* Fax: N/A
